document_data.name: Speakers of the Shadow
document_data.mainbody: The '''Speakers of the Shadow''', who were called the '''Abuya-Deimshowa''' in the tongue of the [[Eshowe]], were a cabal of [[shadow mage]]s who served [[Eshowdow]], the Shadow Giant within the [[Chultan pantheon]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Speakers of the Shadow operated out of the [[Valley of Lost Honor]] within the [[Chult]]an jungles.
document_data.Organization:
Members of this group governed the use of shadow magic among the Eshowe people. They worked closely with the clergy of Eshowdow, the [[Eshewtak]], and even advised the chiefs of the various clans.

New members were initiated by traveling to the [[Shadowfell]] via the use of the ''[[shadow walk]]'' [[spell]]. If the applicant survived for one month and was able to return to the Valley of Lost Honor then they were accepted into the Speakers of the Shadow. Many members of the group transformed themselves into [[shade]]s.
